subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: José Mujica, Uruguay’s president, met Luis Suárez on the tarmac in Montevideo as Suárez returned home after being banned by FIFA for four months for biting Italy’s Giorgio Chiellini.
snippet: José Mujica, Uruguay’s president, met Luis Suárez on the tarmac in Montevideo as Suárez returned home after being banned by FIFA for four months for biting Italy’s Giorgio Chiellini.
